display.title: Crafting Station
description: No, Tinkers' is not in this modpack
Crafting can quickly get &&etiresome&&r. How about making use of your &&2new saw&&r to make this Crafting table?
It allows you to craft from adjacent inventories, making classic &&aGregTech&&r microcrafting so much less &&4tedious&&r.
Saw the table again for a lower-profile Slab version.

subtitle.text: No, Tinkers' is not in this modpack
